A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: (No spoilers) Ignore the bad reviews. This is a great film and my favorite Star Wars of all of the trilogies. This one had a much more original concept than episode VII and keeps you hooked the whole time. Great movie. Seriously can’t understand why anyone wouldn’t like it. Also\, I thought that I’d hate the porgs\, but I ended up loving them. There are also some frog/ nun creatures which look like a bad acid trip that are pretty funny.
